TITLE: Welcome to Apyvyra ERP
SUBTITLE: "Given freely" in tupi-guarani
DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive full-stack ERP application built with modern technologies, designed to help organizations manage their core business processes efficiently.
FULL_STACK_DESCRIPTION: Built with ASP.NET Core Web API backend, React frontend, PostgreSQL database, and Docker containerization for easy deployment.
ERP_DESCRIPTION: Complete Enterprise Resource Planning system with product management, user authentication, categories, and customer relationship management.
LEARNING_DESCRIPTION: Educational project demonstrating real-world software development practices, live coding sessions, and AI-assisted development techniques.
AUTHENTICATED_MESSAGE: Use the menu above to navigate to different sections of the application.
NOT_AUTHENTICATED_MESSAGE: Please log in to access the ERP system.
